    • confirmDeleteCustomer

      public void confirmDeleteCustomer() throws SQLException
      Confirm delete customer. Confirms that a customer is selected. If so, customer is asked to confirm the delete. Response is filtered for an ok press. If present, the selected customer is deleted and the table is repopulated.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Sets a toggle group for calendar view toggles, and adds a listener to that toggle group to determine what view should be displayed actively. populates appointments & customers sets the changeText TextArea to non-editable
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
